|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3S56D40GTP-50L; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1504272740-6.0" and "Rev:1.0sp4" is silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|TP-LINK|TP-LINK PCB ID}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr740n ''TP-LINK TL-WR740N'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :SoC: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 WiSoC (listed as 560 Mhz on OpenWrt, listed as 650 Mhz [[Qualcomm_Atheros|here]]) :Flash: ''[[Winbond]]'' W25Q32FVSIG (4MB) :RAM: ''[[Zentel]]'' A3S56D40GTP-50L (32MB)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-wr740n_v6 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr740n |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=318704 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 15.05.1 |current_supported_version = 18.06.9 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
